alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 22 at 2:40AM MDT until April 23 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM MDT /NOON CDT/ THIS MORNING TO MIDNIGHT MDT /1 AM CDT/ TONIGHT... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected. * WHERE...In Nebraska, Red Willow, Hitchcock and Dundy Counties. In Colorado, Cheyenne, Kit Carson and Yuma Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM MDT /noon CDT/ this morning to midnight MDT /1 AM CDT/ tonight. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Widespread blowing dust is likely. Reduced visibilities associated with blowing dust may magnify already difficult travel conditions.
info.instruction: Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of strong winds. Expect difficult travel conditions. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County; Yuma County
